errors.error_description: The pip install command uses an incorrect package name 'flav.io' instead of the correct name 'flavio'.
correction_candidates: Replace `pip install flav.io` with `pip install flavio`.
Replace `pip install flav.io` with `pip install flav-io`.
Replace `pip install flav.io` with `python -m pip install flavio`.
errors.golden_answer: Replace `pip install flav.io` with `pip install flavio`.
